text:
@NYGovCuomo Pence is so desperate for relevance. He sees his political prospects going down the crapper. Maybe if he shows sufficient obeisance to the Dear Leader and spouts alternative facts he can beat the odds....#PenceLies 

https://t.co/En0AuzT9KW
